sentences.sCn: 假如电风扇上使用的是轻触式开关，则应该在通电后检查一下各挡位所控制的转速之间的区别是否明显。

sentences.sContent: Main fanner is an important equipment of a mine, whose capability directly affects the reliability, stability, security and economy of the mine's ventilation system.
